getStartedContext: Follow these 3 steps to unlock the full potential of T+

getStartedSteps.title: Complete Your Profile
getStartedSteps.description: Fill in your user and company profile to access all T+ platform features

getStartedSteps.title: Apply for Digital Identity
getStartedSteps.description: Create your verified digital identity to securely access T+ services

getStartedSteps.title: Explore Services
getStartedSteps.description: Use the menu bar to browse and try out all available services
